Transcription for 38714

I went away quite a lot on the aeroplane. I remember we used to go every year.
I think the youngest I was when I was on the plane, I think it was two.
I think I was two the first time. It was really different because now we would go through a tunnel to get to the plane.
Before we used to go out and you'd have to go on the plane with the steps. It was really different.
We all used to do things together. We'd usually go with friends on holiday. We wouldn't go on our own. We do more now.
I used to go to France every year and stay with Euracamp Suite. Camp is a big family and travel all around France and go to different places.
